segments.text: Hello , sir . Is there anything I can help you find ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um ... Uh ... I'm just looking , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Need a gift for your girlfriend or wife ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , no , no . I'm just browsing . Thanks anyway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you need anything , just ask .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Um ... well , where's the men's shoe department ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's on the third floor . Turn left when you get off the escalator .
segments.speaker: S1
